headline: KKR to Present at the 2026 UBS Financial Services Conference
summary: NEW YORK, January 22, 2026--KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE: KKR) announced today that Robert H. Lewin, Chief Financial Officer, will present at the 2026 UBS Financial Services Conference on Monday, February 9, 2026 at 1:00PM ET.

headline: What Could Be Shaping The New Story For KKR (KKR)?
summary: What the latest shift in KKR’s price target could mean for you The latest revision to KKR’s price target marks a fresh chapter in how analysts are thinking about the stock, even though the specific figures behind that change have not been disclosed here. With no detailed commentary provided, the move in the target itself becomes the key signal investors can focus on as they weigh how sentiment around KKR is evolving.
